attributes.action: abolish human rights act when a horrific crime has occured
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When horrific crimes such as torture and murder of a child has occured these people should no longer be entitled to human rights.  When someone has no longer acted in a humane way they should be treated as such. Why should tax payers pay for a new identity in such cases?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
